_source.text: 2. I think their next mistake was in viewing the Hard Rock brand as 'special,' 'unique' and worse 'better than just The Beatles.' Now, don't get me wrong: the idea of a theme park with different zones themed to different musical genres is certainly more complete an experience than dedicating a park to just one band, but Hard Rock ISN'T a unique brand or experience.
